fields.text: Welcome to Wish in San Francisco, where shopping is made fun.
To start shopping our curated deals and trending items, press [INDEX].
For your orders or customer support, press [INDEX].
To check your order status, press [INDEX].
To speak with customer service, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to our electronics department at Wish, where shopping is made fun.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our fashion department at Wish, where shopping is made fun.
Please hold the line while we retrieve your order details at Wish, where shopping is made fun.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a customer service representative at Wish, where shopping is made fun.
